name: Mimi's Adventure
description:
Welcome to Mimi’s Adventure, a fast-paced, hilarious text-based game starring troublesome Mimi, a three year old girl who just can’t seem to stay out of trouble. 

She continually causes a lot of problems for her cousin, sneaks around, steals stuff, and spies, and she’s occasionally an arsonist. 

Help Mimi make decisions! 

Should she watch her older sister Lexi play a game that’s inappropriate for three year olds? Should she steal her other sister Bella's things? 

Can she trust her sister Bella? 

With 28 different endings to get, you’re sure to love Mimi’s Adventure! 

Can you get every ending?

Developer's note:

Y'all . . . Thank you SO MUCH for playing! It really means a lot. 

My name is Eight, and I am the founder and owner of RoseWater Studios, a video game company. This is my very first game release! 

If y'all would like updates to what sort of games, merch, and more are coming next, please check out my social media! My TikTok profile is @rosewater_studios and my Instagram profile is @rosewater._.studios

I'd really appreciate it if y'all could share this to your friends, do a playthrough on YouTube, or even just play it if you can't do anything else! And also, I'd love to hear any comments, suggestions, and theories that y'all might have!

Thx for playing!! <3        -Eight
